text:
Lhesh Haruuc Shaarat'kor ("High Warlord Haruuc of the Crimson Blade"), is the chieftain of the [[Ghaal'dar]] tribes and leader of the nation of [[Darguun]]. In 969 YK, while serving as a [[Deneith]] mercenary defending the [[Cyre]]-[[Breland]] border, Lhesh Haruuc united the [[Ghaal'dar]] clans and led a violent uprising that claimed southern [[Cyre]]. The region was officially recognized as the independent nation of [[Darguun]] with the [[Treaty of Thronehold]]. 

Over the last 29 years, Haruuc has greatly improved the lives of his people. But today, he is an aging king, and unless he finds a capable successor, the Ghaal'dar chieftains seem certain to turn on one another after his death, leading to the collapse of the nation.
title: Haruuc Shaarat'kor
tags: government hobgoblin Darguun humanoid goblinoid [[Rhukaan Taash]]
tooltip: high warlord of Darguun, led the bloody uprising 30 years ago that claimed southern Cyre
